sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form :model="form" ref="form">
    <el-row>
      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.commodityType')">
          <el-tag type="info">{{form.commodityType}}</el-tag>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>

      <el-col :span="6">
        <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.commodity')">
          <el-tag type="info">{{form.commodityCode+" : "+form.commodityName}}</el-tag>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>

      <el-col :span="6" v-if="show">
        <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.commodityEdition')">
          <el-tag type="info">{{form.commodityEdition}}</el-tag>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-col>
    </el-row>
  </el-form>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: "CommodityInfo",
    data() {
      return {
        show: true,
        form: {
          commodityType: "",
          commodityCode: "",
          commodityEdition: "",
          commodityName: ""
        },
      }
    },
    created() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getJsonData("pdTestInfo");
      if (pdtempPdInfo) {
        this.form.commodityType = pdtempPdInfo.commodityType === 'R' ? '产品' : '产品套餐';
        this.form.commodityCode = pdtempPdInfo.pdCode;
        let pdEdition =  pdtempPdInfo.pdEdition
        this.form.commodityEdition = pdEdition;
        if (!pdEdition){
            this.show = false
        }
        this.form.commodityName = pdtempPdInfo.pdName;
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

  .el-form-item{
      margin-bottom: 0px;
  }

</style>
